website_summaries.verdict: An attractive and effective patio heater for a mid-level price; this one has more happy customers than complaints.
pros: Earns praise for its sleek bronze finish, which looks great with outdoor decor
Emits enough heat to warm spacious areas
cons: Possible "lemons" that either failed to work upon delivery or after a few uses

customer_reviews.title: But tho heater
customer_reviews.text: Love this heater. It arrived package well, all parts were there and tool to put it together & beautiful hammered bronze Finnish. I'm a woman over 50, and I put this together myself with no problems. (Once I realized the screws to attach the wheels were already in the holes) I run a dog boarding business and spend a lot of time outdoors. This heater keeps me nice and warm. Easy to operate & easy to change tanks out no tools needed.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Toms

customer_reviews.title: No door for tank. Awesome finish and heat.
customer_reviews.text: Pros and cons: Heater gives out nice heat and has a great bronze finish. Don’t really need to add sand as the tank is pretty heavy. Wheels are nice for moving it. Instructions are well written. Without having a tank door it’s cumbersome for one person to change the tanks. Would be nice if the cover had a latch to hold it up. Use some quality metric wrenches for much easier assembly rather than the included cheap one. Well packed but takes about an hour to assemble. Note: Get a silicone pad to place under the tank to prevent rust and scratches. A towel just gets wet quickly.
customer_reviews.author: CatDaddy & Biatch

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best Buy's ever on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: One of the Best Buy's ever on Amazon. This heater is wonderful the efficiency and distribution of heat on the patio is fantastic. Quality construction and great price. My guests don't want to go home they are very comfortable on those cool nights.
customer_reviews.author: Sangeeta Bella

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in two days. Very well packed. Excellent assembly instructions. All fasteners are vacuum packed onto a card and labeled. Fastener labels correspond to the step by step assembly instructions. Assembly is straight forward and easy. Nice looking and gives off a great deal of heat.
customer_reviews.author: Tom H

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, very reasonable priced and very good customer service!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice patio heater and it was the “star” of our October Fest party. The unit starts without problems and it keeps an area of approximately 200 square feet nicely warm. The wheels are very helpful to move the unit around. Also, a big plus is the customer service from the manufacturer. We had a small problem after using the unit for several times but after contacting the customer service the problem was solved very quickly. We highly recommend the product that is very reasonable priced, of very good quality and as I sad comes with excellent customer service if you ever run into any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Magic Runner

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Quit working after seven months. HAS A DEFECTIVE PROPANE CONTROL VALVE. MANUFACTURER HAS NO WARRANTY, WILL SELL ENTIRE BURNER HEAD FOR $150.00. POOR QUALITY AND NOT SUPPORTED BY REPAIR PARTS
customer_reviews.author: PAT DOBSON

customer_reviews.title: Does not Ignite at the push of a button
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item because I wanted an outdoor heater that was simple to ignite and read the description that said this model had "electronic ignition" . Which to me, means just that, push a button and it starts. This model does not do that. It is the same old system, hold the dial, wait 45 seconds and push a button to light the pilot, which was a battery operated sparker to light the pilot light, which hardly ever lite and I ended up using a match every time. I am sending back.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis T. Roth

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The Dyna-Glo stainless propane heater has not disappointed. Was easier than expected to put together, the only hard part was the odd angle in getting the very handy wheels that attach at the bottom so that it can be rolled around easily...for us that required two people. Other than that it was easily assembled and we are not whiz kids at that sort of thing. We have a large wooden deck and it really puts out a great amount of heat...have just used it for the lounging portion ( so only on low) have no doubt it would heat the entire deck. It is great looking and seems very high quality. Most happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Middlju

customer_reviews.title: Lights easily. Performs well
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Robust construction. Quality finishes. Chrome and stainless steel shine. Lights easily. Performs well, heated area under reflector as would be expected. I would/will but again.
customer_reviews.author: AeroSonicBlue

customer_reviews.title: Like pulling teeth to get company to send out replacement part...and even that didn’t make it work
customer_reviews.text: I got the company to send me a new top burn unit as I could never get it to work from day 1. It STILL doesn’t work. STILL! Very frustrated and wouldn’t recommend. Looks like I’ll have to pay someone to get this to work. Thankfully I have my good old standby chiminea for when I entertain during the winter months/cool evenings.
customer_reviews.author: vicki stuessi

customer_reviews.title: Superb finish, throws off lots of heat.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice, well-made patio heater. Like most tall LP heaters, it is VERY thirsty — more than I expected. I’m guessing 5 hours to a 20-lb LP tank when running at full heat setting. Not this product’s ‘fault’, just surprising to me. On wind-free days, this heater shines. It warms about a 8-foot circle. Nice. When it’s windy, the heater’s height means a lot of the heat gets carried away with the breeze. The finish on this heater was flawless. Assembly was straightforward, but does require some aptitude. Packaging was great, protecting the bits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: MichGuy

customer_reviews.title: A Big Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 8 of these heaters. Every factory set screw has come out on all 8. Requiring a different screw and lock nut and time and labor. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MJF

customer_reviews.title: It rusts....
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of these February 2018 and used twice. All the nuts holding down the hood - rusted. The propane tank cover rusts where it meets the ground leaving rust rings on my patio. So now I have about 6 rust ring stains on my concrete. These are supposed to be for outdoor use! If you like your patio - don't buy these...
customer_reviews.author: Fred and Susie's

customer_reviews.title: Works great, awesome heat and looks clean
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED: turns out the heater works amazing and the Amazon recommended "expert' that assembled it is a knucklehead. Husband came home and immediately got it working. We ordered this, along with the Amazon professional assembly option, and after 3 hours of the professional working on assembling this heater he advised us that he cannot get it to work. SO disappointed, as we were going to use for our 4th of July party tomorrow. Also hate the fact that I just paid someone $77.00 to build something that will not function. That's a lose, lose today.
customer_reviews.author: M Morris

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I love the finish; the product was also well wrapped in styrofoam to prevent damage. I added the sand which also has signifcantly helped stabilize the product. The starter and burner unit are great and easy to use. The frustrating thing was how long it took to remove the blue plastic coating on all the reflector pieces (in excess of 1 hour!). With the right tools, the rest took 15 minutes to set up, but that plastic coating was infuriating......
customer_reviews.author: Mattie C

customer_reviews.title: missing final directions in English
customer_reviews.text: Worked great first time. However, I hired a very respected and qualified person to assist me and still.... lots of issues. Although, the parts are well market the instructions are not clear and the final instructions were not to be found in English. Also well laminated card attached with details but missing the use instructions. The most important part. They are taped to the top so not much use. I hope to find instructions on-line and laminate. Otherwise. looks good
customer_reviews.author: Northern CA

customer_reviews.title: Puts out a great amount of heat
customer_reviews.text: Puts out a great amount of heat. It was easy to assemble. Even with the 'sand donut' fully filled, ours was pushed over by (moderate) mountain winds. I;ve had to tie it back to the house when not in use. For that reason I deducted a star.
customer_reviews.author: 2BikersAndABorderCollie

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in the quality
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived today....extremely easy to assemble but I can’t get it to work. Checked everything per the instructions and still can’t get it to light. Was hoping to use for a get together tonight but since it’s Saturday the Mfg. is closed and can’t get any tech support. Very disappointed in the quality. It’ll be a real pain if I have to take it apart and try and rebox to send it back!
customer_reviews.author: Phil77

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 12 Months Now Won’t Ignite. When they work, AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 23 Oct 2018 (delivered a few weeks later) so used about six times last cold season in Texas. Very nice heat on a porch during gatherings! However! Pulled one out to fire up this year and the igniter barely works. Changed battery, and gas bottle...still NO luck. Purchased two and the other works like a champ. The igniter on the one that works is significantly louder so assume the igniter has gone bad. Notes: Assembly wasn’t to hard and did it by myself. Two people would make it easier.
customer_reviews.author: Hurst

customer_reviews.title: Sturdiness
customer_reviews.text: Not the best sturdiness, specifically in the base part of the unit. Three legged support brackets are very flimsy since the unit is somewhat top heavy. In order to support the heavy duty tubular post, head assembly and the two reflector plates, these brackets should be sturdier or beefed up. The heater, as I assembled it originally, was perfectly vertical, from all sides. After being moved once it is already tilting to one side. Not very eye pleasing. There is room for improvement in this area. Otherwise everything else is good thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Works fantastically well
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality product. Instructions are straightforward. Looks great. Works fantastically well.
customer_reviews.author: Lexter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and value
customer_reviews.text: My first Amazon review - just had to express how great this heater is. Well packaged, all parts are easily assembled and the quality is fantastic. Particularly impressed with the powdercoat finish. Looks great, seems like it will wear well, and the heat output is better than any similar heater I've seen at restaurants, resorts, etc. An excellent value!
customer_reviews.author: Verified Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the hassle
customer_reviews.text: This tips over relatively easy, even with sand in the bottom. First day we had it, it was blown over. Assembly was a pain. It does not give off a great deal of heat.
customer_reviews.author: sammyantha

customer_reviews.title: Solid patio Heater
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up, you may need a ladder or stool to finish putting the last top piece together. Startup is very difficult, you must read the instructions very carefully when starting up the patio heater for the first time. Very warm all around up to about 15 ft. radius.
customer_reviews.author: SushicCat55

customer_reviews.title: Does not heat
customer_reviews.text: We were able to assemble the heater. Eventually got it to light and burn consistently but there is no heat. Tried to trouble shoot by exchanging tanks but to no avail. Had planned to use the heating on Thanksgiving to extend our outdoor kitchen. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen J. Tyerman

customer_reviews.title: Works as designed!
customer_reviews.text: This has worked for us and we love it. We sat out on the deck after thanksgiving dinner and it kept us warm and we were able to enjoy being outside.Would have given it a 5 star but nothing is perfect (smile). Definitely 4.5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Derek Higgs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality heater and provides more heat than the other brans I had.
customer_reviews.author: A&B

customer_reviews.title: Wheel bolts can't be secured
customer_reviews.text: There is a design flaw that prevents tightening the bolts that hold the wheel assembly to the base. The heads are captive inside the base and cannot be held while attempting to tighten the nuts.
customer_reviews.author: M. H. Schatzlein

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping and while we've not used this for very long, it puts out good heart and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Jet

customer_reviews.title: Superior performance and finish.  Great price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a superior product. Quality construction, high-end finish, excellent performance. Two of them heated our covered, 310 square-foot porch wonderfully during a winter football party. Guests actually spent time outside in December on the coast of Maryland.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Works great outside.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, good quality, looks and works great. I was able to use it on an outdoor patio with a roof over hang. Had 12" clearance above it and the heat really deflects down and out and doesn't escape above the metal ring deflector....didn't bother the vinyl siding ceiling. Would never used in an enclosed area for safety reasons.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda R.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this product...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, just used one winter and now it’s doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: M. bravo

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and light. Quality product. Only the screws on the hood on top started rusting immediately
customer_reviews.author: Dad

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Great product works perfectly. Heat fast. Easy to install. Recommend !
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Hot buy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Gives out plenty of heat. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: ben h.

customer_reviews.title: Almost really good
customer_reviews.text: The overall performance is really pleasant. The only issue is that the automatic starter works on and off. It can be resolved by using a lighter, but it makes thing easier when the automatic starter works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Avalos

customer_reviews.title: heater is tall,gives off a lot of heat
customer_reviews.text: heater is tall gives off a lot of heat on high setting. Excellent for keeping warm on a cool night outside
customer_reviews.author: Debby (Prime)

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy to assemble, sturdy, great quality and gives a lot of heat. Very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Moon Rider

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: We just got this out, put it together to enjoy by the pool and it doesn’t work. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: T Warren

customer_reviews.title: Dyno-Glo
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and works like a charm. Radiates heat for approximately 5 to 6 feet with it turned all the up. I would definitely buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and works great! Puts out plenty of heat.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J McNab

customer_reviews.title: A great outdoor porch heater.
customer_reviews.text: Came in as advertised. Easy to put together, the heat shield on top was the hardest. Very nice to sit under on a cold day.
customer_reviews.author: frank p

customer_reviews.title: Great Heater
customer_reviews.text: My son and daughter-in-law love this they have it on their porch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Takes half hour to put together
customer_reviews.text: We are using this product to heat a workspace outside and it works great except when the wind is greater than 15 mph
customer_reviews.author: Bmac

customer_reviews.title: The product did not work, the company cannot fix it or replace it
customer_reviews.text: Never worked once. Amazon will not help you replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Work great when it actually working.
customer_reviews.text: Worked 3 times great and stopped. Cannot get it to light. Guess it’s a good paper weight. Not sure what to do now after assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Patio Heater!
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional Quality. Well written instructions. Easy assembly. And it works Perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J. McManus

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchasing experience. This is my first purchase of a Dyna-Glo, thus far all is good.
customer_reviews.author: MPK

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase...it is sturdy, quiet, and puts out a ton of heat. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Erik from MA

product_meta.title: Dyna-Glo DGPH201BR 48000 BTU Premium Hammered Bronze Patio Heater
product_meta.description: Color:BronzeFeaturing a powerful 48,000 BTUs, the stylish Dyna-Glo Premium Hammered Bronze patio heater is sure to keep you and your family warm year round. The one step electronic ignition makes it easy to start, and the variable control allows you to adjust the temperature according to your needs. Your 20 pound propane tank (not included) neatly stores in the base of the unit. The weighted base keeps the unit stable and secure. In the unlikely event that the heater is knocked over, the unit features an automatic shut off safety feature. The wheel assembly helps you to easily move the unit into storage in the off season, and bring it back out on chilly nights. Let us help you extend the outdoor season under your Dyna-Glo patio heater this year.
feature_bullets: Electronic ignition ignites at the push of a button
Easy to install 20 lb. LP gas tank (not included)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars120 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
